articles.author: Mike Eckel
articles.title: Russia's New Offensive Grinds Into Action As Ukraine Punches Back Hard - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: For weeks if not months, Ukrainian military and political leaders, along with some Western intelligence officials, have been warning that Russia is preparing for a major new offensive. It appears to have begun.
articles.content:
